t:parameter.name: NetworkTimeout
t:parameter.description: Timeout for blocking network calls (in seconds). Use -1 for no timeout.

t:parameter.name: TargetPort
t:parameter.description: Port used by the SMB or NBT service

t:parameter.description: List of Pipes to check for
